function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global downturn and growing antagonisms between major powers","Impact":"Potential for reduced cooperation on global issues, including disease containment and mitigation efforts","Mitigation":"Engage in diplomatic efforts to promote cooperation and reduce tensions, foster open dialogue and collaboration between major powers","Technologies":"Diplomatic communication channels, international cooperation frameworks","People":"World leaders, policymakers, international organizations","Owner":"International organizations, diplomatic experts, world leaders"},{"Description":"Crisis in the oil sector and global energy security","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to energy supply disruptions, economic instability, and geopolitical tensions","Mitigation":"Invest in renewable and sustainable energy sources, diversify energy supply sources, promote energy efficiency and conservation","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy storage solutions, smart grid systems","People":"Energy industry stakeholders, policymakers, environmental organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, energy industry stakeholders, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Criticism of carbon border tax and 'green protectionism'","Impact":"Resistance to implementing policies aimed at promoting sustainability and reducing carbon emissions, potential trade tensions","Mitigation":"Engage in dialogue with stakeholders to address concerns, provide support and incentives for transitioning to sustainable practices, collaborate on global sustainability initiatives","Technologies":"Tracking and verification systems for carbon emissions, sustainable production technologies, green energy incentives","People":"Policy makers, industry leaders, environmental advocates","Owner":"Government agencies, international organizations, industry leaders"}]}
